titleStmt.title: The burthen of a loaden conscience: or the miserie of sinne set forth by the confession of a miserable sinner.
titleStmt.author: Kilby, Richard, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; some pages cropped, stained, tightly bound and underlined, with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
